trans-unit.source: App Model v2.0 | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: App Model v2.0 | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: How to register an app with Microsoft for enabling sign-in and integrating apps with app model v2.0.
trans-unit.target: How to register an app with Microsoft for enabling sign-in and integrating apps with app model v2.0.

trans-unit.source: App model v2.0 preview: How to register an app with Microsoft
trans-unit.target: App model v2.0 preview: How to register an app with Microsoft

trans-unit.source: To build an app that accepts both MSA & Azure AD sign-in, you'll first need to register an app with Microsoft. You won't be able to use any existing app you may have with Azure AD or MSA - it's time to create a brand new one.
trans-unit.target: To build an app that accepts both MSA & Azure AD sign-in, you'll first need to register an app with Microsoft. You won't be able to use any existing app you may have with Azure AD or MSA - it's time to create a brand new one.

trans-unit.source: This information applies to the v2.0 app model public preview.
trans-unit.target: This information applies to the v2.0 app model public preview.

trans-unit.source: For instructions on how to integrate with the generally available Azure AD service, please refer to the <link><linkText>Azure Active Directory Developer Guide</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For instructions on how to integrate with the generally available Azure AD service, please refer to the <link><linkText>Azure Active Directory Developer Guide</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Visit the Microsoft App Registration Portal
trans-unit.target: Visit the Microsoft App Registration Portal

trans-unit.source: First things first - navigate to <link><linkText>https://apps.dev.microsoft.com</linkText><title></title></link>. This is the new app registration portal where you can manage anything & everything about your Microsoft apps.
trans-unit.target: First things first - navigate to <link><linkText>https://apps.dev.microsoft.com</linkText><title></title></link>. This is the new app registration portal where you can manage anything & everything about your Microsoft apps.

trans-unit.source: Sign in with either a personal or work or school Microsoft account.
trans-unit.target: Sign in with either a personal or work or school Microsoft account.

trans-unit.source: If you don't have either, sign up for a new personal account.
trans-unit.target: If you don't have either, sign up for a new personal account.

trans-unit.source: Go ahead, it won't take long - we'll wait here.
trans-unit.target: Go ahead, it won't take long - we'll wait here.

trans-unit.source: Done?
trans-unit.target: Done?

trans-unit.source: You should now be looking at your list of Microsoft apps, which is probably empty.
trans-unit.target: You should now be looking at your list of Microsoft apps, which is probably empty.

trans-unit.source: Let's change that.
trans-unit.target: Let's change that.

trans-unit.source: Click Add an app, and give it a name.
trans-unit.target: Click Add an app, and give it a name.

trans-unit.source: The portal will assign your app a
trans-unit.target: The portal will assign your app a

trans-unit.source: globally unique Application Id that you'll use later in your code.
trans-unit.target: globally unique Application Id that you'll use later in your code.

trans-unit.source: If your app includes a server-side component that needs access tokens for calling APIs
trans-unit.target: If your app includes a server-side component that needs access tokens for calling APIs

trans-unit.source: (think: Office, Azure, or 3rd party), you'll want to create an ** Application
trans-unit.target: (think: Office, Azure, or 3rd party), you'll want to create an ** Application

trans-unit.source: Secret** here as well.
trans-unit.target: Secret** here as well.

trans-unit.source: Next, add the Platforms that your app will use.
trans-unit.target: Next, add the Platforms that your app will use.

trans-unit.source: For web based apps, provide a Redirect URI where sign-in messages can be sent.
trans-unit.target: For web based apps, provide a Redirect URI where sign-in messages can be sent.

trans-unit.source: For mobile apps, copy down the default redirect uri automatically created for you.
trans-unit.target: For mobile apps, copy down the default redirect uri automatically created for you.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, you can customize the look and feel of your sign-in page in the Profile section.
trans-unit.target: Optionally, you can customize the look and feel of your sign-in page in the Profile section.

trans-unit.source: Make sure to click Save before moving on.
trans-unit.target: Make sure to click Save before moving on.

trans-unit.source: Build a Quick Start App
trans-unit.target: Build a Quick Start App

trans-unit.source: Now that you have a Microsoft app, you can complete one of our quick start
trans-unit.target: Now that you have a Microsoft app, you can complete one of our quick start
